keyword.term: execution plan, right anti semi join
logical operators, right anti semi join

summary.p: The Right Anti Semi Join operator outputs each row from the second (bottom) input when a matching row in the first (top) input does not exist. A matching row is defined as a row that satisfies the predicate in the Predicate property (if no predicate exists, each row is a matching row).
Right Anti Semi Join is a logical operator.
